resources.string: This program manipulates the camera LED.\n

Warning: Leaving the LED on for a long time might overheat it.

Full brightness 'always on' has been tested running for 1/2 hr, but there is the risk this could damage the LED.

Original code from Nexus One Torch by Ben Buxton, released under the GPL, v3.
http://n1torch.googlecode.com/

Thanks to David Prieto for new UI design.

Modified for CyanogenMod by Steve Kondik.

Full brightness has been tested successfully for 1/2 hour of operation, but got quite hot, and started flickering (temporarily) at 45 mins. Long term effects are unknown.

This is not supported on the widget yet.

Click 'Accept' if you want to use it at your own risk.
